reviews.review_msg: His brain is so massive some would even use the term Gigabrain. Sometimes I wish I had his brain so I could use it to solve world hunger where all we do is bask under his godly presence!! The true definition of playing chess when everyone plays checkers.

As a hard working student that attends every lecture, I was disgusted that other students could skip classes and face no repercussions. However, Zafar did what no other professors have the balls to do. He dropped a pop quiz in a 1hour lecture with the easiest questions. Instantly I pull ahead of my peers by 5% and cementing Zafar as the GOAT.

Zafar will randomly decide to assign a pop quiz and dock the majority of the class 5% for fun, just because he can't handle an emply lecture room at 8:30 am... Y'all should stay FAR FAR away from this one, couldn't tell if this was a 300 level class or a 100 level class tbh
